column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Anti-Narcotics Unit detained a drug trafficker
column4: seizing 3.853 kg of illegal drugs.------The operation was carried out on September 10
column5: 2019 by the Anti-Narcotics Unit (A11) in Khan Sen Sok
column6: Phnom Penh.------The suspect was named as Yorn Choeun
column7: a 29-year-old Cambodian PASSAPP driver.------Evidence included: – Methamphetamine (ICE) weighing 3254.31 grams------– Methamphetamine (*EDIT: ketamine) weighing 346 g ------– MDMA pills weighing 253.23 grams------totaling 3853 kg ------POST NEWS
